log_as_list.title: Log as a list
log_as_list.description: Whether to log incoming signals as lists. The default behavior is to log lists of incoming signals one at a time. Setting this to True allows one to see if the block received multiple signals at once or multiple signals sequentially.

log_at.title: Log At
log_at.description: The log level to log outgoing messages at. Default is INFO.

log_level.title: Log Level
log_level.description: Sets the log level for the block. Default is INFO.
